      • getQuestionBoxController

        public QuestionBoxController getQuestionBoxController(int questionIndex)
        Used for unitTesting and debugging ONLY This method requires debug to be true, else it will always return null
        Parameters:
        questionIndex - The index of the question in the vBox container
        Returns:
        If main.DEBUG is true, this will return the controller for a specified question, else null
